This week I'm in Europe speaking at various Java User Groups about integrating Flex and Java. I tend to move quickly through code demos so many people have asked me how they can continue learning. Here are a few resources to get you started: InfoQ Article: Building Web and Desktop Applications with BlazeDS and AMF Adobe TV Video: Flex Messaging Service Adobe TV Video: The Data Management Service in LiveCycle Data Services Email List: JavaFlexCoders Yahoo! Group BlazeDS LiveCycle Data Services 2.6 Beta Hopefully that is enough to get you started. Have fun and let me know how it goes!
